channel.title: How to add working defense?
channel.description: well my server is a very old source (jordiescape), and its pk only source for me... At this source, def realy doesnt matters... u cant, as example, wear guthan and be safe of melee atacks cuz it gaves the def, i know how to edit it at item.cfg, but it doesnt realy protects you, as it supposed to do. if anyone have a code or something to fix it, ill be glad to thank you, please help me, byes :D

item.title: How to add working defense?
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

[quote=“ringer24, post:2, topic:256838”][quote author=raulhenriq link=topic=339184.msg2630681#msg2630681 date=1232147734]
well my server is a very old source (jordiescape), and its pk only source for me…
At this source, def realy doesnt matters…
u cant, as example, wear guthan and be safe of melee atacks cuz it gaves the def, i know how to edit it
at item.cfg, but it doesnt realy protects you, as it supposed to do.
if anyone have a code or something to fix it, ill be glad to thank you, please help me, byes

[/quote]
You need to code it yourself.[/quote]

if you dont know how to help, dont blame us.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2009, 05:21:53 pm[/size][hr]of course i did restart, im not a new or non-experienced coder… i just have no idea about how to make def works. Cuz i’ve study some sources and didnt learned anything that helps me about the def :
